name: deadlock_web
description: A web application to analyze team performance in Deadlock matches by comparing players' recent statistics.

scripts.build: npm run build-css-prod && rm -rf public && mkdir -p public && cp index.html public/ && cp styles.css public/ && cp enhanced-styles.css public/ && cp -r js public/ && cp -r hero_mapping public/ && cp -r downloads public/ && cp -r config public/
